text: good news if you own a property in rutland - house prices in the county have risen by more than 20 % in the last year .

in leicestershire prices have gone up by 6.9 % and in leicester it 's a 9 % increase .

documents.title: ulloa looks to leave foxes
text: leicester striker leonardo ulloa is prepared to hand in a transfer request in the next 24 hours in a bid to resolve his future .
the 30-year-old and his representatives held talks with the premier league-winning club last night , with an offer from alaves on the table .
ulloa has been unhappy over his lack of playing time with the champions this season .
he has not been rewarded with a new deal after helping them win the title last term .

documents.title: thousands of environmentally-friendly bags made in leicestershire
text: the morsbag movement is 10 years old this month .
twenty groups across leicestershire have sewn one in three of the nearly 250,000 bags that have been made worldwide .
concern for the environment is at the heart of this movement - supporters claim one bag can replace around 500 plastic ones .
author: Carol Hinds
Reporter, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: criminals often 'get revenge ' by helping police
text: the force said their informants are vital to protecting the public .
one retired police superintendent told me they are sometimes criminals motivated by revenge , while others are trying to leave criminal gangs and join witness protection programmes .
police said informants help them to avoid more expensive surveillance schemes and are therefore good value for money .

Social affairs correspondent, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: police spend tend of thousands on informants
text: leicestershire police have spent £ 244,000 paying `` informants '' in the last four years .
the payments have gone to people known as `` covert human intelligence sources '' who provide information about anything from burglaries and drug dealers to guns and organised crime .

Social affairs correspondent, BBC East Midlands Today
